column4: guys, i think my buddy's computer has a memory issue. It won't work with XP or with linux live. I think it's the memory. When i did a memory test, it lasted 40hrs before i turned it off. what's up ?
what memtest did u run
what kinda hardware is used ?
linux ubuntu live start up memory test
tried a regular memtest before ?
both OS's boot up. linux live crashes. windows can't access the hd properly and always comes up with mem errors ... Can't access hex....
did u try a boot cd with memtest ?
no. buddy's computer. my mem is fine.
yes, that's what i'm talking about. i did a memtest with ubuntu live
not ubuntu :)
ubuntu crashed
no response
it must be mem right ?
try this one :
hence
what one ?
one sec, checkin for a link
do you have the hirens boot disc ?
if ubuntu live crashes. it's gotta be a mem issue, right ?
not too sure
why should i need a 'special' boot disk.
because it has handy tools on it :-) hdd diagnose, partitioning and so on handy tools
